survey.title: SUPPORT THE LAW-- POLICE SURVEY
survey.introduction: Dear Sir or Madam: Recently your department requested information about the 'Support The Law' program from R.J. Reynolds Tobacco. Would you please take a moment and complete this questionnaire about the materials you received. Your assistance is greatly appreciated.

questions.question: Did you receive the 'Support The Law' information kit and material samples which you requested?
Once you received the kit and materials, did you review them in detail?
questions.follow_up: If yes, what was your impression?

questions.question: Did you share the program with anyone else in your department?
Did you share the program with anyone else in the community?
Do you have any other suggestions on how this program might be improved?
Please check your type of organization:

survey.closing: Please include your name and address below, and return this questionnaire in the enclosed postage-paid envelope. Thank you very much for your time.
